data.persona: I am a bat. Some adventurers just woke me and my family up with their torches. They don't see us on this cave ceiling yet.
data.description:
You are in the Dark Cave.
Its dark, not much light can be seen in this hollow and empty cave site. Its made of stone that has been here seemingly since time began, the walls are hard as diamond, yet black like darkness itself.
There's a stone, a stalagmites rising from the ground, and a Stalactite here.
The animal and the caveman are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to scare off the caveman before he finds us
data.mid_motivation: I do not want the outside world to know that we the bats live here
data.long_motivation: I can ensure that we live an undisturbed and peaceful life by preventing outsiders from finding us

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get down from ceiling after noticing caveman

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get caveman to leave out of fear
